alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 12:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rockdale, southeastern DeKalb, central Henry and west central Newton Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1231 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Kelleytown, or 7 miles southwest of Conyers, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Covington, Stockbridge, Lithonia, Porterdale, Magnet, Almon, Richardson Park, Arabia Mountain, Kelleytown, and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
